_comment: Mapping alias bahasa Indonesia ke terminologi WHO ICD-9-CM untuk memudahkan matching
_format: key: istilah Indonesia (lowercase), value: WHO standard term
ventilator mekanik: Continuous invasive mechanical ventilation for less than 96 consecutive hours
ventilasi mekanik: Continuous invasive mechanical ventilation for less than 96 consecutive hours
mechanical ventilation: Continuous invasive mechanical ventilation for less than 96 consecutive hours
kultur sputum: Microscopic examination of specimen from trachea, bronchus, pleura,lung,and other thoracic specimen, and of sputum, Culture and sensitivity
kultur dahak: Microscopic examination of specimen from trachea, bronchus, pleura,lung,and other thoracic specimen, and of sputum, Culture and sensitivity
pemeriksaan kultur sputum: Microscopic examination of specimen from trachea, bronchus, pleura,lung,and other thoracic specimen, and of sputum, Culture and sensitivity
usg: Diagnostic ultrasound of other sites of thorax
ultrasonografi: Diagnostic ultrasound of other sites of thorax
ultrasound: Diagnostic ultrasound of other sites of thorax
pemeriksaan fungsi ginjal: Microscopic examination of specimen from kidney, ureter, perirenal, and periureteral tissue, bacterial smear
fungsi ginjal: Microscopic examination of specimen from kidney, ureter, perirenal, and periureteral tissue, bacterial smear
pemeriksaan fungsi hati: Microscopic examination of specimen from liver, biliary tract, and pancreas, bacterial smear
fungsi hati: Microscopic examination of specimen from liver, biliary tract, and pancreas, bacterial smear
suction: Other lavage of bronchus and trachea
pengisapan lendir: Other lavage of bronchus and trachea
suction lendir: Other lavage of bronchus and trachea
